simulation module

This module defines the class DropletEvaporationModel and all its methods necessary for the computation.

return:

_description_

rtype:

DropletEvaporationModel

class simulation.DropletEvaporationModel[source]

Bases: object

calculate_diameter_squared(ta, Bm, model='d2_law')[source]

Calculate D² over time using the chosen model.

Parameters:

  • ta (array) – Time array

  • Bm (Float) – Spalding mass transfer number

  • model (str, optional) – Choice of droplet evaporation model (d2 law or infinite liquid conductivity), defaults to “d2_law”

Returns:

Droplet diameter squared

Return type:

array

calculate_droplet_position(time, velocity)[source]

Calculate droplet velocity over time using the chosen Velocity.

Parameters:

  • time (array) – Time array of the velocity

  • velocity (2D array) – Velocity attribute of the Up OdeResult

Returns:

Droplet position

Return type:

nupmy.ndarray

calculate_droplet_temperature(ta, Bm, Dsquare)[source]

Calculate the droplet temperature with values of the Infinite Liquid Conductivity model

Parameters:

  • ta (array) – Time array

  • Bm (Float) – Spalding mass transfer number

  • Dsquare (array) – Droplet diameter squared

Returns:

Droplet temperature

Return type:

OdeResult

calculate_droplet_velocity(ta, Dsquare)[source]

Calculate droplet velocity over time using the chosen Dsquare.

Parameters:

  • ta (array) – Time array

  • Dsquare (array) – Droplet diameter squared

Returns:

Time and Velocity attributes of Up

Return type:

OdeResult

calculate_mass_transfer_number(Pvap)[source]

Compute the Spalding mass transfer number Bm.

Parameters:

Pvap (Float) – Vapor pressure

Returns:

Spalding mass transfer number

Return type:

Float

vapor_pressure(T, model_type='low')[source]

Calculate vapor pressure based on temperature and model type.

Parameters:

  • T (Float) – Temperature

  • model_type (str, optional) – Model type given Temperature (low or high), defaults to “low”

Returns:

Vapor pressure

Return type:

Float
